configuration:
yarn.nodemanager.disk-health-checker.min-healthy-disks 0.0
yarn.nodemanager.disk-health-checker.max-disk-utilization-per-disk-percentage 100.0
yarn.resourcemanager.store.class org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.resourcemanager.recovery.FileSystemRMStateStore
yarn.resourcemanager.fs.state-store.uri hdfs://192.168.1.2:9000/rmstore
yarn.resourcemanager.recovery.enabled true
yarn.log-aggregation-enable true
yarn.log-aggregation.retain-seconds 259200
yarn.log.server.url http://192.168.1.2:19888/jobhistory/logs
yarn.nodemanager.resource.cpu-vcores 96
yarn.scheduler.maximum-allocation-vcores 48
yarn.scheduler.minimum-allocation-vcores 2
yarn.resourcemanager.hostname 192.168.1.2
yarn.nodemanager.resource.memory-mb 122880
yarn.scheduler.maximum-allocation-mb 61440
yarn.scheduler.minimum-allocation-mb 2048
yarn.nodemanager.pmem-check-enabled false
yarn.nodemanager.vmem-check-enabled false
yarn.resourcemanager.address 192.168.1.2:18040
yarn.resourcemanager.scheduler.address 192.168.1.2:18030
yarn.resourcemanager.webapp.address 192.168.1.2:18088
yarn.resourcemanager.resource-tracker.address 192.168.1.2:18025
yarn.resourcemanager.admin.address 192.168.1.2:18141
yarn.nodemanager.aux-services mapreduce_shuffle
yarn.nodemanager.aux-services.mapreduce.shuffle.class org.apache.hadoop.mapred.ShuffleHandler
spark.shuffle.service.port 7337
yarn.nodemanager.aux-services mapreduce_shuffle
-
yarn.nodemanager.delete.debug-delay-sec 600
